projects.title: Dahlia asbl
projects.description: Dahlia asbl is a non profit association web site built in React. Whith Dahlia, you can make a donation throught PayPal, Visa card or Mastercard. Dahlia web  site is bilingual

projects.title: MagoEat Frontend
projects.description: MagoEat is an online restaurant that allows users to order from their prefered restaurants, built in React Native, It has Android and iOS versions in French

projects.title: MagoEat Backend
projects.description: THis is the backend project built with ExpressJs, Mongodb and Mongoose as the ORM. This app makes the frontend Mobile App dynamic and connects it to the datanase

projects.title: Horizon Travel Plus
projects.description: Horizon Travel Plus is a travel agency, this web site is built in PHP and allows users to contact the compony and reserve places in holtels, air planes, ... for different reasons
